page.title: 03WHY I LIKE VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: I like living in Hales Green, near Yeaveley, because of the peace and quiet, and because we don't have as much air pollution. There is lots of room for roller_ skating and things like that. We don't have any shops so there aren't many people. We don't have any tourists like Ashbourne does. We can go for walks in the country_side instead of the park. There are more hills to sledge on in the winter. It is safer on the road because there are not as many cars as in a town. There is more wildlife in the woods next to where we live than you would find in a town park. You can also communicate better with your friends without going far away, so you know and have more friends.
